path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Spring 25/Clinicals/Assignments/Pediatric Sim Assignments and Info/Asthma Parent Assignments.pdf
text: Updated 2025 Quinteros Asthma Simulation Parent Content Review the following prior to your asthma simulation: • Read Chapter 25 pages 607-614 in your Introduction to Maternity and Pediatric Nursing book. • Review and be familiar with the client’s chart in ChartFlow. • Complete the asthma drug table and Asthma Parent Pre-Simulation Assignment (watch video) and submit it via Dropbox on D2L by 7:00 am the morning of your scheduled immunization simulation. The following should be completed after you have completed your asthma simulation: • Parent Self Reflection Assignment submit via Dropbox on D2L • Immunization quiz on D2L These are due by 7:00 pm on the day of your scheduled immunization simulation.
